recipes.title: Veggie Stew
recipes.method: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 5. Place the carrot, leek and tofu in a large bowl. Add the stock and mix well. 2. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well. 3. Place the mixture in a large bowl and cover with a lid. 4. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 40 minutes. 5. Serve with a slaw of your choice

recipes.title: ICE CREM
recipes.method: Ice cream is a sweet dessert made from eggs, cream or various fruits. Ice cream requires first the preparation of the main ingredient combination and the process of freezing the combination

recipes.title: Cake
recipes.method: A cake (Italian: torta / Latin: torta, round bread) is a confectionery product consisting of several cakes soaked in cream or jam. The top of the cake is usually decorated with cream, icing or fruit.

recipes.title: Veggie Pizza
recipes.method: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 5. Add the pasata, green pepper and mushrooms to the base. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 30 minutes. 5. Serve with a slaw of your choice

recipes.title: Suspicious salad
recipes.method: Salted herring is divided into fillets, that is, the meat is separated from the bones. Then the fillet is cut into small cubes.Onion is peeled and finely chopped (you can also grind it in a blender, only with control that it does not turn into porridge). Boiling water is poured and rinsed to remove bitterness.
